S04n457:10: na nirvāsi na nirvāṇe na nirvāṇaṃ tvayi sthitam |

S04n457:17: bālā gṛhṇanti jāyantaṃ timiraṃ taimirā yathā || 8 ||
S04n457:18: dhyātā dhyānaṃ ca dhyeyaṃ ca prahāṇaṃ satyadarśanam |
S04n457:21: sāpyatra manyanā śūnyā yayā śūnyeti manyate || 10 ||

S04n457:47: na cāpi budhyāmi na ca bodhayāmi || 22 ||

S04n457:62: khadyotā iva mattasya yathā citrā na santi ca |
S04n457:65: na cāsau vidyate māyā evaṃ dharmāḥ svabhāvataḥ || 30 ||

S04n457:69: tadā yogaṃ samāpanno drakṣyate māṃ na saṃśayaḥ || 32 ||
S04n457:73: bhrāntaṃ traidhātuke cittaṃ vicitraṃ khyāyate yataḥ || 34 ||
S04n457:83: na saṃbhavaṃ na vibhavaṃ prajñāyukto vipaśyati || 37 ||

S04n457:93: bhrānteśca vidyate māyā na māyā bhrāntikāraṇam || 42 ||
S04n457:97: vibhāvya lokamevaṃ tu parāvṛtto yadā bhavet |

S04n457:109: khyātau kalpanti utpattiṃ bālāḥ kalpadvaye ratāḥ || 49 ||
S04n457:110: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karmaṃ ca cittacaittā na mārakam |
S04n457:117: na tiṣṭhati yadā dehe tena mahyamagocaram || 53 ||
S04n457:130: nāsti skandheṣvātmā na sattvo na ca pudgalaḥ |
S04n457:131: utpadyate ca vijñānaṃ vijñānaṃ ca nirudhyate || 60 ||
S04n457:132: nimnonnataṃ yathā citre dṛśyate na ca vidyate |
S04n457:133: tathā bhāveṣu bhāvatvaṃ dṛśyate na ca vidyate || 61 ||
S04n457:135: dṛśyaṃ khyāti tathā nityaṃ prajñayā ca na vidyate || 62 ||
S04n457:138: skandhān pratītya saṃbuddho na dṛṣṭaḥ kenacitkvacit |
S04n457:139: yo na dṛṣṭaḥ kvacitkena kutastasya vibhāvanā || 64 ||
S04n457:147: abhijñā vaśitā tasya balā cittasya citritā || 68 ||
S04n457:148: bhāvā yeṣāṃ hyanutpannāḥ śūnyā vai asvabhāvakāḥ |
S04n457:150: cittaṃ hi khyāti cittasya bahirdhā khyāti rūpiṇaḥ |
S04n457:152: saṃkalā buddhabimbaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ ca vidāraṇam |
S04n457:158: naiḥsvabhāvyaṃ hi bhāvānāṃ yadā budhyanti prajñayā |
S04n457:174: na hyasti kanakaṃ tatra bhūmiśca kanakāyate || 81 ||
S04n457:190: na cotpadyā na cotpannāḥ pratyayo'pi na kecana |
S04n457:194: na svabhāvo na vijñaptirna vastu na ca ālayaḥ |
S04n457:200: nātra cittaṃ na rūpāṇi bhrāntaṃ cittamanādikam || 93 ||
S04n457:201: tadā yogī hyanābhāsaṃ prajñayā paśyate jagat |
S04n457:203: atikramya tu putrā me nirvikalpāścaranti te || 94 ||
S04n457:205: asatyāḥ satyataḥ khyānti tathā bhāveṣu bhāvanā || 95 ||
S04n457:207: bhrāntiṃ kalpenti utpannāṃ bālāṃ kalpadvaye ratāḥ || 96 ||
S04n457:215: cittasya dharmatā śuddhā gagane nāsti vāsanā || 100 ||
S04n457:217: bahirdhā nāsti vai dṛśyamato vai cittamātrakam || 101 ||
S04n457:219: gṛhṇāti viṣayān yena vijñānaṃ hi taducyate || 102 ||
S04n457:221: vartamānaṃ hi vijñānaṃ kuśalākuśalaṃ hi tat || 103 ||
S04n457:226: cittaṃ hi bhūmayaḥ sapta nirābhāsā ca aṣṭamī |
S04n457:236: asattā caiva sattā ca dṛśyate ca vicitratā |
S04n457:238: nirvikalpaṃ yadi jñānaṃ vastvastīti na yujyate |
S04n457:239: yasmāccittaṃ na rūpāṇi nirvikalpaṃ hi tena tat || 112 ||
S04n457:241: kartā karma kriyā caiva sarvathāpi na vidyate || 113 ||
S04n457:254: sarvaṃ vidyati saṃvṛtyāṃ paramārthe na vidyate |
S04n457:258: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo nāstīti ca na vidyate || 121 ||
S04n457:268: māyāhastī yathā citraṃ patrāṇi kanakā yathā |
S04n457:269: tathā dṛśyaṃ nṛṇāṃ khyāti citte ajñānavāsite || 126 ||
S04n457:270: āryo na paśyate bhrāntiṃ nāpi tattvaṃ tadantare |

S04n457:287: na te yathā vikalpyante na ca te vai na santi ca || 135 ||
S04n457:291: na ca te tathā yathādṛṣṭā na ca te vai na santi ca || 137 ||

S04n457:297: sattvāśca bodhisattvāśca kṣetrāṇi ca diśe diśe || 140 ||

S04n457:345: paścātkāle gate nāthe brūhi ko'yaṃ dhariṣyati || 163 ||
S04n457:347: mahāmate nibodha tvaṃ yo netrīṃ dhārayiṣyati || 164 ||

S04n457:371: asti nāsti ca dvāvantau yāvaccittasya gocaraḥ |
S04n457:375: bālānāṃ na tathā khyāti yathā khyāti manīṣiṇām |
S04n457:379: abhūtvā yasya cotpādo bhūtvā cāpi vinaśyati |
S04n457:380: pratyayaiḥ sadasaccāpi na te me śāsane sthitāḥ || 180 ||
S04n457:383: atīto vidyate bhāvo vidyate ca anāgataḥ |
S04n457:386: antarābhavasaṃgrāhaṃ ye kalpanti na te budhāḥ || 183 ||

S04n457:390: saṃketācca pṛthagbhūto na jāto na nirudhyate || 185 ||
S04n457:391: darpaṇe udake netre bhāṇḍeṣu ca maṇīṣu ca |
S04n457:392: bimbaṃ hi dṛśyate teṣu na ca bimbo'sti kutracit || 186 ||
S04n457:393: bhāvābhāsaṃ tathā cittaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā yathā nabhe |
S04n457:395: na me yānaṃ mahāyānaṃ na ghoṣo na ca akṣarāḥ |
S04n457:396: na satyā na vimokṣā vai na nirābhāsagocaram || 188 ||
S04n457:399: ekatvena pṛthaktvena bhāvo vai pratyaye na tu |

S04n457:406: granthato na tu arthena na te nairātmyamāśritāḥ || 193 ||

S04n457:443: labhyante yena vai svapne abhijñāśca caturvidhāḥ || 211 ||

S04n457:447: bālā yadā na budhyante utpādaṃ deśayettadā || 213 ||
S04n457:451: adṛśyaṃ dṛśyamānaṃ hi kasya kiṃ varṇyate kutaḥ || 215 ||
S04n457:454: ālayo muñcate kāyaṃ manaḥ prārthayate gatim |

S04n457:466: kutra keṣāṃ kathaṃ kasmātkimarthaṃ ca vadāhi me |
S04n457:470: vikalpo mano nāma vijñānaiḥ pañcabhiḥ saha |

S04n457:474: pratyayā dhātavaḥ skandhā dharmāṇāṃ ca svalakṣaṇam |

S04n457:496: yathā na bhāvo nābhāvo gaganaṃ kathyate mayā |

S04n457:646: bhūtālabdhātmakā hyete na lakṣyaṃ na ca lakṣaṇam |

S04n457:667: kriyā karma phalaṃ caiva svapnakāryaṃ tathā bhavet || 322 ||
S04n457:682: talpaviddhe na svaptavyaṃ bhūmiścāpi na lepayet |

S04n457:686: śailīkaṃ mṛnmayaṃ lohaṃ śāṅkhaṃ vai sphaṭikamayam |

S04n457:706: vihāre yatra vai dhūmaḥ pacyate vidhivatsadā |
S04n457:707: uddiśya yatkṛtaṃ cāpi na tatkalpati yoginām || 342 ||

S04n457:732: śiro hi tasya mārjanti nimittaṃ tathatānugāḥ || 354 ||
S04n457:745: vikalpavṛttyā bhāvo na mokṣaṃ kalpenti bāliśāḥ |

S04n457:771: buddhyā vivecyamānaṃ hi na tantraṃ nāpi kalpitam |
S04n457:772: niṣpanno nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kathaṃ buddhyā prakalpyate || 374 ||

S04n457:803: cittena cīyate karma manasā ca vicīyate |

S04n457:828: raṅge na vidyate citraṃ na kuḍye na ca bhājane |
S04n457:831: kṛtvā dharme vyavasthānaṃ tattvaṃ deśemi yoginām || 403 ||
S04n457:834: vicitrā hi yathā māyā dṛśyate na ca vidyate |

S04n457:850: saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaṃ nityaṃ kalpyate na ca vidyate || 412 ||
S04n457:852: asanto vā vidṛśyante paratantraṃ tathā bhavet || 413 ||
S04n457:855: cittaṃ manaśca vijñānaṃ nairātmyaṃ syāddvayaṃ tathā |
S04n457:856: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi buddhānāṃ gocaro hyayam || 415 ||
S04n457:858: raṅgaṃ hi yathāpyekaṃ kuḍye citraṃ vidṛśyate || 416 ||
S04n457:860: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvā hi mama gotre na santi te || 417 ||
S04n457:863: kāyena vācā manasā na tatra kriyate śubham |
S04n457:866: kāyaṃ manomayaṃ cittaṃ gotraṃ tāthāgataṃ śubham || 420 ||
S04n457:876: kurvanti jinaputrā vai nṛpatvaṃ ca bhavālaye || 425 ||
S04n457:881: saccāsacca sato naiva kṣaṇikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ na vai |
S04n457:883: bhāvā vidyanti saṃvṛtyā paramārthe na bhāvakāḥ |
S04n457:888: abhilāpasaṃbhavo bhāvo dṛṣṭvā vai nāsti vidyate || 431 ||
S04n457:890: ālayaṃ tu tathā śuddhaṃ taraṃge na virājate || 432 ||
S04n457:895: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate cittaṃ cittaṃ dṛśyātpramuhyate |
S04n457:903: aṇuśo vibhajya dravyaṃ na vai rūpaṃ vikalpayet |
S04n457:905: mā śūnyatāṃ vikalpetha māśūnyamiti vā punaḥ |
S04n457:910: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyamato'pyarthaṃ na vidyate || 442 ||
S04n457:911: citraṃ keśoṇḍukaṃ māyāṃ svapna gandharvameva ca |
S04n457:912: alātaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇā ca asantaṃ khyāyate nṛṇām || 443 ||
S04n457:920: tathā ca śrāvako mūḍho lakṣaṇena pravāhyate || 447 ||
S04n457:921: niṣṭhāgatirna tattasyā na ca bhūyo nivartate |
S04n457:926: tathā te buddhadharmākhyaṃ kāyaṃ prāpsyanti māmakam || 450 ||
S04n457:927: paṅkamagno yathā hastī itastato na dhāvati |
S04n457:931: ākāśaṃ śaśaśṛṅgaṃ ca vandhyāyāḥ putra eva ca |
S04n457:936: niṣpannaṃ tathatetyuktaṃ sūtre sūtre sadā mayā || 455 ||
S04n457:937: vyañjanaṃ padakāyaṃ ca nāma cāpi viśeṣataḥ |
S04n457:938: bālāḥ sajanti durmedhā yathā paṅke mahāgajāḥ || 456 ||
S04n457:941: yānānāṃ nāsti vai niṣṭhā yāvaccittaṃ pravartate |
S04n457:942: citte tu vai parāvṛtte na yānaṃ na ca yāyinaḥ || 458 ||
S04n457:947: cittena dhāryate kāyo mano manyati vai sadā |
S04n457:949: tṛṣṇā hi mātā ityuktā avidyā ca tathā pitā |
S04n457:955: siddhāntaśca nayaścāpi pratyātmaṃ śāsanaṃ ca vai |
S04n457:956: ye paśyanti vibhāgajñā na te tarkavaśaṃ gatāḥ | 465 ||
S04n457:957: na bhāvo vidyate satyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate |
S04n457:958: abhāvena tu vai mokṣaṃ kathaṃ necchanti tārkikāḥ || 466 ||
S04n457:960: dṛṣṭidvayaṃ prapuṣṇanti na ca jānanti pratyayān || 467 ||
S04n457:963: rāgo na vidyate dveṣo mohaścāpi na pudgalaḥ |
S04n457:965: yasyāṃ ca rātryāṃ dhigamo yasyāṃ ca parinirvṛtaḥ |
S04n457:968: taiśca buddhairmayā caiva na ca kiṃcidviśeṣitam || 471 ||
S04n457:970: skandhā vidyanti bhāvena ātmā teṣu na vidyate || 472 ||
S04n457:980: kāryaṃ hi pratyayāḥ sarve na kāryājjāyate bhavaḥ || 477 ||
S04n457:981: kāryaṃ na jāyate kāryaṃ dvitvaṃ kārye prasajyate |
S04n457:987: prajñaptisatyato hyātmā dravyaḥ sa hi na vidyate |
S04n457:988: skandhānāṃ skandhatā tadvatprajñaptyā na tu dravyataḥ || 481 ||
S04n457:998: bahirdhā jāyate nṝṇāṃ cittamātraṃ hi laukikam || 486 ||
S04n457:999: dṛśyaṃ na vidyate bāhyaṃ cittacitraṃ vidṛśyate |
S04n457:1003: bahirdhā nāsti vai rūpaṃ svacittaṃ dṛśyate bahiḥ |
S04n457:1007: na hetavo na koṭyo vai dṛṣṭāntāvayavāni ca |
S04n457:1017: yathā hi darpaṇe bimbaṃ keśoṇḍustimirasya vā |
S04n457:1018: tathā hi vāsanaiśchannaṃ cittaṃ paśyanti bāliśāḥ || 496 ||
S04n457:1020: artho na vidyate bāhyo yathā tīrthyairvikalpyate || 497 ||
S04n457:1021: rajjuṃ yathā hyajānānāḥ sarpaṃ gṛhṇanti bāliśāḥ |
S04n457:1025: na hi yo yena bhāvena kalpyamāno na lakṣyate |
S04n457:1028: ato nāsti na gantavyaṃ astitvaṃ na ca kalpayet || 501 ||
S04n457:1029: kalpitaṃ kalpyamānaṃ hi yadidaṃ na tadātmakam |
S04n457:1034: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā kena bhrāmitā brūhi me mune || 504 ||
S04n457:1035: bhāvānāṃ bhāvatā nāsti cittamātraṃ ca dṛśyate |
S04n457:1037: kalpitaṃ yadi vai nāsti yathā kalpati bāliśaḥ |
S04n457:1038: anyathā vidyate cāsau na ca buddhyāvagamyate || 506 ||
S04n457:1039: āryāṇāṃ yadi vā so'sti nāsau bālairvikalpitaḥ |
S04n457:1040: āryāṇāmatha mithyāsau āryā bālaiḥ samaṃ gatāḥ || 507 ||
S04n457:1044: etaddhi putra mā kranda gṛhṇa citramidaṃ phalam || 509 ||
S04n457:1047: abhūtvā yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairna ca saṃkulaḥ |
S04n457:1049: alabdhātmakaṃ hyajātaṃ ca pratyayairna vinā kvacit |
S04n457:1050: utpannamapi te bhāvo pratyayairna vinā kvacit || 512 ||
S04n457:1056: arthaṃ sunītaṃ hi mayā na ca budhyanti bāliśāḥ || 515 ||
S04n457:1059: lakṣaṇaṃ bhāva saṃsthānaṃ nāma caiva caturvidham |
S04n457:1062: somabhāskarayorbhāvā ye nāśenti na te sutāḥ || 518 ||
S04n457:1065: eṣā hi mudrā muktānāṃ putrāṇāṃ mama śāsane |
S04n457:1068: nityānityaṃ na prāpnoti saṃsāraśca na vidyate || 521 ||
S04n457:1071: pradhvaṃsi patitaṃ rūpaṃ vijñānaṃ ca bhavālaye |
S04n457:1073: atha taiḥ saha saṃbaddhaṃ karma vai dhvasyate nṛṇām |
S04n457:1074: dhvaste tu karmasaṃbandhe na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ || 524 ||
S04n457:1075: atha dhvastamapi taiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃsāre yadi jāyate |
S04n457:1077: nābhinnaṃ na ca vai bhinnaṃ cittaṃ rūpaṃ vikalpanāt |
S04n457:1082: nāstyasti kathaṃ bhavati rūpe cānityatā yathā || 528 ||
S04n457:1085: kalpitaṃ hi vināśete mama netrī vinaśyate |
S04n457:1088: sarve ca te hyasaṃkathyā mama netrīvināśakāḥ || 531 ||
S04n457:1093: nāsau śikṣati buddhānāṃ yasteṣāṃ saṃgrahe caret |
S04n457:1095: viviktaṃ kalpitaṃ bhāvaṃ ye tu paśyanti yoginaḥ |
S04n457:1099: tathā hi sattvagotrāṇi citrā vai karmavarjitā |
S04n457:1100: dṛśyābhāvānna karmāsti na ca vai karmajā gatiḥ || 537 ||
S04n457:1102: kiṃ tu vidyanti vai bhāvā yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ || 538 ||
S04n457:1103: yadi bhāvā va vidyante yathā bālairvikalpitāḥ |
S04n457:1107: yeṣāṃ tu bhāvo vai nāsti yathā bālairvikalpitaḥ |
S04n457:1108: teṣāṃ na vidyate vṛttirindriyāṇāṃ na yoginaḥ || 541 ||
S04n457:1120: kalpito nāsti vai bhāvaḥ kalpayiṣyanti tārkikāḥ || 547 ||
S04n457:1133: paṭaiśca vai kaṭo nāsti paṭo vai vīraṇaistathā |
S04n457:1134: eka ekatrā saṃbhūtaḥ pratyayaiḥ kiṃ na jāyate || 554 ||
S04n457:1136: paravādā hyamī sarve mayā ca samudāhṛtāḥ || 555 ||
S04n457:1143: na bhūtaṃ nāpi cābhūtaṃ pratyayairna ca pratyayāḥ |
S04n457:1148: ahetukaṃ sadā paśyan vikalpo na pravartate || 561 ||
S04n457:1152: vastu na vidyate paśyaṃścittamātraṃ na vidyate |
S04n457:1153: avastukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate || 563 ||
S04n457:1155: ahetukaṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate || 564 ||
S04n457:1157: vidyante na ca vidyante na te mannayakovidāḥ || 565 ||
S04n457:1159: etaddhi laukikaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate || 566 ||
S04n457:1161: dvicittatā prasajyeta na ca cittaṃ dvilakṣaṇam || 567 ||
S04n457:1162: svadhāraṃ hi yathā khaḍgaṃ svāgraṃ vai aṅguliryathā |
S04n457:1163: na chindate na spṛśate tathā cittaṃ svadarśane || 568 ||
S04n457:1164: na paraṃ na ca vai tantraṃ kalpitaṃ vastumeva ca |
S04n457:1165: pañca dharmā dvicittaṃ ca nirābhāse na santi vai || 569 ||
S04n457:1168: atha vaicitryasaṃsthāne kalpā ca yadi jāyate |
S04n457:1172: anādimati saṃsāre artho vai nāsti kutracit |
S04n457:1175: na cābhāvena vai puṣṭo vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate || 574 ||
S04n457:1176: yathāpi dānīṃ naivāsti tathā pūrve'pi nāstyasau |
S04n457:1185: arthābhāve kathaṃ cittaṃ jāyate brūhi me mune || 579 ||
S04n457:1186: ahetukamidaṃ sarvaṃ na cittaṃ na ca gocaraḥ |
S04n457:1187: na ca vai puṣyate cittaṃ tribhavaṃ kriyavarjitam || 580 ||
S04n457:1190: anutpannamidaṃ sarvaṃ na ca bhāvā na santi ca || 581 ||
S04n457:1192: anutpannān svabhāvāṃśca śūnyāḥ kena vadāsi me || 582 ||
S04n457:1198: na tu tīrthyadṛṣṭyā pralayo samavāyo na vidyate || 585 ||
S04n457:1200: anutpādaiḥ prasādhyante mama netrī na naśyati || 586 ||
S04n457:1202: kathaṃ kena kutaḥ kutra saṃbhavo'hetuko bhavet || 587 ||
S04n457:1206: atha bhāvasya nāmedaṃ nirarthaṃ vā bravīhi me || 589 ||
S04n457:1207: na ca bhāvo hyanutpādo na ca pratyayalakṣaṇam |
S04n457:1208: na ca bhāvasya nāmedaṃ na ca nāma nirarthakam || 590 ||
S04n457:1217: na bāhyabhāvaṃ bhāvānāṃ na ca cittaparigraham |
S04n457:1220: na jātu śūnyayā śūnyā kiṃ tvanutpādaśūnyayā || 596 ||
S04n457:1222: kalapācca pṛthagbhūtaṃ na jātaṃ na nirudhyate || 597 ||
S04n457:1223: bhāvo na vidyate hyanyaḥ kalāpācca pṛthak kvacit |
S04n457:1231: yasya janyo hi bhāvo'sti saṃkalāyāḥ pṛthak kvacit |
S04n457:1243: parato yasya vai bhāvaḥ pratyayairjāyate kvacit |
S04n457:1244: na saṃkalāmātramevedaṃ na te yuktyāgame sthitāḥ || 608 ||
S04n457:1245: yadi janyo na bhāvo'sti syādbuddhiḥ kasya pratyayāt |
S04n457:1246: anyonyapratyayā hyete te tena pratyayāḥ smṛtāḥ || 609 ||
S04n457:1248: kalāpo'yaṃ na dharmo'sti ato vai niḥsvabhāvatā || 610 ||
S04n457:1250: na tu śāstrasya bhedo'sti doṣabhedastu vidyate || 611 ||
S04n457:1252: indriyāṇāṃ balaṃ jñātvā nayaṃ deśemi bāliśān || 612 ||
S04n457:1257: astitvasādhakaṃ nāsti nāsti nāsti na yujyate |
S04n457:1259: kiṃcidāśritya punaḥ kiṃcitkhyāyate yasya vai matam |
S04n457:1262: anavasthā prasajyeta kiṃcicca kiṃ ca no bhavet || 617 ||
S04n457:1265: māyājālaṃ na parṇāni na kāṣṭhaṃ na ca śarkarā |
S04n457:1270: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu na saṃsṛtirna nirvṛtiḥ || 621 ||
S04n457:1271: vikalpe hyavidyamāne tu vikalpo na pravartate |
S04n457:1272: apravṛttiṃ kathaṃ cittaṃ cittamātraṃ na yujyate || 622 ||
S04n457:1275: bāhyaṃ na vidyate dṛśyaṃ yathā bālairvikalpyate |
S04n457:1286: buddhā deśenti vai yogaṃ mayā ca prativarṇitāḥ || 629 ||
S04n457:1291: tathā hi dehinaḥ sarve vikalpena samīritāḥ |
S04n457:1294: ābhā vṛttiḥ kathaṃ kena cittamātraṃ vadāhi me || 633 ||
S04n457:1299: nāma nāmni visaṃyuktaṃ yadā paśyati kalpitam |
S04n457:1302: ye tvanyathāvabudhyante na te buddhā na bodhakāḥ || 637 ||
S04n457:1303: pañca dharmāḥ svabhāvāśca vijñānānyaṣṭa eva ca |
S04n457:1305: yadā buddhiśca boddhavyaṃ viviktaṃ paśyate jagat |
S04n457:1309: catvāro'rūpiṇaḥ skandhāḥ saṃkhyā teṣāṃ na vidyate |
S04n457:1311: lakṣaṇasya parityāgānna bhūtaṃ na ca bhautikam |
S04n457:1317: ālayaṃ hi manasyātmā ātmīyaṃ jñānameva ca |
S04n457:1320: tadā dvayaṃ na kalpanti ātmā cātmīyameva ca || 646 ||
S04n457:1321: apravṛttaṃ na puṣṇāti na ca vijñānakāraṇam |
S04n457:1323: vikalpaṃ cittamātraṃ ca lokaṃ kena vadāhi me |
S04n457:1328: astitvaṃ hi kathaṃ tasya cittagrāhānna jāyate || 650 ||
S04n457:1329: vikalpo na bhāvo nābhāvo ato'stitvaṃ na jāyate |
S04n457:1337: na saṃbhavo na vibhavo anityatvāddhi bāliśām |
S04n457:1338: na hi naśyamānaṃ kiṃcidvai kāraṇatvena dṛśyate || 655 ||
S04n457:1339: adṛṣṭaṃ hi kathaṃ kena nānityo jāyate bhavaḥ |
S04n457:1346: cittamātraṃ na dṛśyo'sti dvidhā cittaṃ vidṛśyate |
S04n457:1356: gatayaḥ ṣaṭ samākhyātā yatra jāyanti dehinaḥ || 663 ||
S04n457:1358: saraṃkṣya kuśalān sarvān viśeṣo mokṣa eva vā || 664 ||
S04n457:1359: kṣaṇe kṣaṇe tvayā yanmaraṇaṃ upapattiṃ ca |
S04n457:1366: rūpagrāhavinirmuktaṃ na janma na ca bhajyate || 668 ||
S04n457:1373: śarīre vyāmamātre ca lokaṃ vai lokasamudayam |
S04n457:1378: nivārārthaṃ tu dṛṣṭīnāṃ svabhāvaṃ na vikalpayet || 674 ||
S04n457:1379: chidradoṣānna niyamo na vā cittaṃ pravartate |
S04n457:1381: ajñāna tṛṣṇā karma ca vijñānādyā ayonijāḥ |
S04n457:1382: anavasthākṛtakatvaṃ ca na kṛtvā jāyate bhavaḥ || 676 ||
S04n457:1390: yathāhamanye ca sadā nāstyasti na visaṃkaret |
S04n457:1401: hastaḥ karo yathā loke indraḥ śakraḥ puraṃdaraḥ |
S04n457:1403: rūpācca śūnyatā nānyā anutpādaṃ tathaiva ca |
S04n457:1415: bhāvā vidyantyanutpannā na vā brūhi mahāmune |
S04n457:1435: maṇḍalaṃ hi na me kiṃcinna ca deśemi dharmatām || 700 ||
S04n457:1436: dvaye sati hi doṣaḥ syāddvayaṃ buddhairviśodhitam |
S04n457:1439: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca vikalpasya vadāhi me || 702 ||
S04n457:1440: yathā yena prakāreṇa jāyate viṣayo mukham |
S04n457:1442: rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā bahirdhā vai vikalpaḥ saṃpravartate |
S04n457:1447: mā vikalpaṃ vikalpetha nirvikalpā hi paṇḍitāḥ |
S04n457:1454: dṛśyate na ca tannāsti tathā cotpādalakṣaṇam || 709 ||
S04n457:1456: tathā hi sarvabhāvānāṃ saṃbhavo na hyasaṃbhavaḥ || 710 ||
S04n457:1470: vāyunā kīryate rūpaṃ kathaṃ bhūtaiḥ pravartate || 717 ||
S04n457:1474: vyatibhinnāni rūpāṇi cittaṃ rūpaṃ na bhautikam || 719 ||
S04n457:1484: tīrthyā vadanti janma bhūtānāṃ bhautikasya ca || 724 ||
S04n457:1485: anutpannā yato ye'nye tīrthyāḥ kalpanti kāraṇaiḥ |
S04n457:1498: tīrthyavādo na saṃdeho na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ || 731 ||
S04n457:1499: rūpaṃ ca vidyate tatra ārūpye nāsti darśanam |
S04n457:1500: tadabhāvo na siddhānto na yānaṃ na ca yāyinam || 732 ||
S04n457:1502: aṣṭavidhaikadeśaṃ hi kṣaṇe kāle na gṛhṇanti || 733 ||
S04n457:1503: na pravartati yadā rūpaṃ indriyā na ca indriyaiḥ |
S04n457:1504: ato hi deśeti bhagavān kṣaṇikā indriyādayaḥ || 734 ||
S04n457:1509: indriyā indriyārthāśca mūḍhānāṃ na tu paṇḍitāḥ |
S04n457:1510: bālā gṛhṇanti nāmena āryā vai arthakovidāḥ || 737 ||
S04n457:1511: ṣaṣṭhaṃ hi nirupādānaḥ sopādāno na gṛhyate |
S04n457:1522: sopādānastathā hyātmā tārkikaiḥ kiṃ na gṛhyate || 743 ||
S04n457:1524: dṛṣṭāntaṃ kiṃ na kurvanti tārkikā ātmasādhakāḥ || 744 ||
S04n457:1530: lakṣaṇaṃ yadi jānāti jñānaṃ saṃjāyate nayam || 747 ||
S04n457:1532: ātmanā saha saṃyuktaṃ na ca dharmāḥ prakīrtitāḥ || 748 ||
S04n457:1539: na pudgalo na ca skandhā buddho jñānamanāsravam |
S04n457:1548: tiṣṭhanti na ca naśyante ātmā doṣaistathā vinā || 756 ||
S04n457:1552: vidyamānā na dṛśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam || 758 ||
S04n457:1554: akovidā na gṛhṇanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam || 759 ||
S04n457:1555: yathā hi garbho garbhiṇyāṃ vidyate na ca dṛśyate |
S04n457:1556: ātmā hi tadvatskandheṣu ayuktijño na paśyati || 760 ||
S04n457:1560: vidyamānāṃ na paśyanti tathā skandheṣu pudgalam || 762 ||
S04n457:1570: svarasaṃ vidyate teṣu anāsvādyaṃ na gṛhyate || 767 ||
S04n457:1572: na ca paśyantyavidvāṃso vidvān dṛṣṭvā vimucyate || 768 ||
S04n457:1575: vilakṣaṇā hi vai dharmāścittamekaṃ na gṛhyate |
S04n457:1577: cittānupaśyī ca yogī cittaṃ citte na paśyati |
S04n457:1581: paurāṇikamidaṃ vartma ahaṃ te ca tathāgatāḥ |
S04n457:1583: kāmadhātau tathārūpye na vai buddho vibudhyate |
S04n457:1587: asatyātmani māyādyā dharmā nāstyasti vai katham |
S04n457:1588: bālānāṃ khyāti tathatā kathaṃ nāsti nirātmikā || 776 ||
S04n457:1592: dvāvapyetau na janakau kāraṇaiḥ kalpyate katham || 778 ||
S04n457:1600: bālānāṃ ca viśeṣeṇa brahmacaryaṃ na vidyate || 782 ||
S04n457:1602: vyañjitaiḥ pravrajantyeke na cānye ca pravādinaḥ || 783 ||
S04n457:1605: mayi nirvṛte varṣaśate vyāso vai bhāratastathā |
S04n457:1607: mauryā nandāśca guptāśca tato mlecchā nṛpādhamāḥ |
S04n457:1609: kaliyugānte lokaiśca saddharmo hi na bhāvitaḥ || 786 ||
S04n457:1613: cātuṃ rvarṇā nṛpendrāśca ṛṣayo dharmameva ca || 788 ||
S04n457:1614: vedāśca yajñaṃ dānaṃ ca dharmasthā vartsyate punaḥ |
S04n457:1616: evaṃ mayā śrutādibhyo loko vai vibhramiṣyati || 789 ||
S04n457:1621: vastrapūtaṃ jalaṃ peyaṃ kaṭisūtraṃ ca dhārayet |
S04n457:1628: ahaṃ cānye kṛtayuge śākyasiṃhaḥ kalau yuge || 794 ||
S04n457:1635: mātā ca me vasumatiḥ pitā vipraḥ prajāpatiḥ |
S04n457:1637: campāyāṃ haṃ samutpannaḥ pitāpi ca pitāmahaḥ |
S04n457:1644: ahaṃ ca virajo'nye vai sarve te kṛtino jināḥ || 802 ||
S04n457:1647: na dvāpare na tretāyāṃ na paścācca kalau yuge |
S04n457:1651: dvayaṅgulaṃ tryaṅgulaṃ vāpi candraṃ candrāntaraṃ bhavet |
S04n457:1652: anyathā citryamānaṃ hi lobhanīyaṃ hi bāliśān || 806 ||
S04n457:1657: ekaṃ ca bahudhā nāsti vailakṣaṇyānna kutracit |
S04n457:1659: yadyekaṃ bahudhā vai syātsarve hyakṛtakā bhavet |
S04n457:1662: ekaṃ hi bahudhā bhavati tārkikāṇāmayaṃ nayaḥ || 811 ||
S04n457:1677: bhaviṣyati mahāyogī nāmnā vai virajo muniḥ |
S04n457:1678: mokṣasya deśakaḥ śāstā munīnāmeṣa vai dhvajaḥ || 819 ||
S04n457:1696: abhūtikā ca bhūtāni bhūtāḥ kiṃcitkva cāgatau || 828 ||
S04n457:1703: yathā hi pāradaḥ śuddha upakleśairna lipyate |
S04n457:1707: anyatve ca tadanyatve ubhayaṃ nobhaye tathā |
S04n457:1708: astitvaṃ nirupādānaṃ na ca nāsti na saṃskṛtam || 834 ||
S04n457:1714: ekatvena tadanyatvena na ca budhyanti tārkikāḥ || 837 ||
S04n457:1715: darpaṇe udake netre yatha bimbaṃ pradṛśyate |
S04n457:1717: bhāvyaṃ vibhāvanādhyātā mārgaḥ satyā ca darśanam |
S04n457:1719: dṛṣṭaṃ naṣṭaṃ yathā vidyuccakraṃ chidragṛhe yathā |
S04n457:1743: anutpanne ca vijñāne ajñānādi na vidyate |
S04n457:1744: tadabhāve na vijñānaṃ saṃtatyā jāyate katham || 852 ||
S04n457:1751: pavanaṃ hi vahnerdahanaṃ preraṇe na tu saṃbhave |
S04n457:1761: cittaṃ sattvāśca nirvāṇaṃ prakṛtyā bhāsurā nu vai |
S04n457:1766: dṛṣṭāśca te yathābhūtaṃ dṛṣṭvā kleśā vidāritāḥ |
S04n457:1769: na ca budhyanti durmedhā avaktavyaśca kathyate || 864 ||
S04n457:1770: bherī yathā candanajā bālaiḥ kurvanti nānyathā |
S04n457:1800: nivartate yadā cittaṃ nivṛttaṃ paśyato jagat |
S04n457:1801: muditāṃ labhate bhūmiṃ buddhabhūmiṃ labhanti ca || 878 ||
S04n457:1810: yathā hi grantho granthena yuktyā yuktistathā yadi |
S04n457:1812: cakṣuḥ karma ca tṛṣṇā ca avidyāyoniśastathā |
S04n457:1815: ye dharmā hetuprabhavā hetuṃ teṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat |
S04n457:1816: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodho evaṃ vādī mahāśramaṇaḥ ||
